description: This file defines a network API interface for fetching metadata related to copy text and rating settings in a media application, using Retrofit annotations for HTTP GET requests.

classes.name: MetadataApi
classes.description: Interface defining HTTP endpoints for retrieving metadata including copy text and rating settings.

methods.name: getIndiceCopy
methods.description: Fetches copy text for 'Índice' based on locale, as part of the metadata API.

methods.name: getVodRatingSettings
methods.description: Fetches rating overlay settings, with optional locale parameter.
